Class NbDialogOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.Operator
      • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ComponentOperator
        • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ContainerOperator
          • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.WindowOperator
            • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.DialogOperator
              • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.JDialogOperator
                • org.netbeans.jellytools.NbDialogOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.jemmy.Outputable, org.netbeans.jemmy.Timeoutable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClasspathCustomEditorOperator, ColorCustomEditorOperator, DimensionCustomEditorOperator, FileCustomEditorOperator, FontCustomEditorOperator, IconCustomEditorOperator, OptionsOperator, PluginsOperator, PointCustomEditorOperator, ProcessDescriptorCustomEditorOperator, QuestionDialogOperator, RectangleCustomEditorOperator, SaveAsTemplateOperator, StringArrayCustomEditorOperator, StringCustomEditorOperator, TreeViewCustomEditorOperator, WizardOperator

    public class NbDialogOperator
extends org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.JDialogOperator
    Handle generic NetBeans dialog. The dialog can include Yes, No, OK, Cancel, Close or Help buttons. The dialog is identified by its title.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NbDialogOperator

        public NbDialogOperator(String title)
        Waits until dialog with requested title is found. Title is compared on partial match and case non-sensitive. If dialog is not found, runtime exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        title - title of window

      • NbDialogOperator

        public NbDialogOperator(JDialog dialog)
        Created NbDialogOperator with given dialog
        Parameters:
        dialog - JDialog instance

        public void closeByButton()
